version_description: Fixed video player size for some iPhones and a few minor bug fixes.

- Now you can easily contact us through the new "Contact Us" menu option.
- A few minor enhancements.

هل تودون الحصول على شهادة اتمام الدورة؟
الآن يمكنكم طلب شهادة اتمام الدورة الخاصة بكم.

Certificates! Who doesn't love them?
Now you can have your own personalized certificate of completion when you complete watching a course!

تحسين عملية اصدار شهادة الدورة لبعض المستخدمين
Improvements to course progress and getting the certificate
Fix a few errors related to iPhone X and XS with iOS 12
